steps.title: Welcome to ResuGenie Dashboard
steps.content: This is your main dashboard where you can access all features. Let's take a quick tour to help you get started!

steps.title: Profile Completion Widget
steps.content: This widget shows your profile completion progress. Complete your profile to auto-fill your resumes with your information.

steps.title: Platform Features
steps.content: Here you can access all main features: Build Resume, Resume Evaluator, Job Matcher, and Cover Letter Generator.

steps.title: Quick Actions
steps.content: Quick actions help you get started quickly with essential tasks like creating a new resume or completing your profile.

steps.title: Recent Activity
steps.content: Here you can see your recent resumes and evaluations. This helps you track your work and continue where you left off.

steps.title: Navigation Bar
steps.content: Use the navigation bar to quickly access different sections of the dashboard. The active page is highlighted.

steps.title: Token Balance
steps.content: Your token balance is displayed here. Tokens are used for AI-powered features like resume evaluation and cover letter generation.

steps.title: Theme Switcher
steps.content: Switch between light and dark themes to customize your experience.

steps.title: Profile Menu
steps.content: Access your profile, account settings, and logout from here. You can also view your token usage statistics.

steps.title: My Resumes Page
steps.content: This is where you manage all your resumes. You can view, edit, delete, and export your resumes from here.

steps.title: Create New Resume
steps.content: Click this button to create a brand new resume from scratch with our guided builder.

steps.title: Resume List
steps.content: All your resumes are displayed here. You can switch between grid and list view, and filter or search your resumes.

steps.title: Resume Actions
steps.content: For each resume, you can preview, edit, export as PDF, rename, or delete it using the action menu.

steps.title: Job Matcher
steps.content: Match your resume against job postings to see how well you fit. Get AI-powered match scores and improvement suggestions.

steps.title: Select Resume
steps.content: Choose which resume you want to match against job postings. You can select from your saved resumes.

steps.title: Job Details
steps.content: Enter the job title and full job description here. The more details you provide, the better the match analysis.

steps.title: Match Now
steps.content: Click this button to analyze how well your resume matches the job posting. You'll get a detailed match score and recommendations.

steps.title: Match Results
steps.content: View your match score, strengths, weaknesses, and AI-generated suggestions to improve your resume for this specific job.

steps.title: Match History
steps.content: See all your previous job matches here. You can review past analyses and track your improvement over time.

steps.title: Cover Letter Generator
steps.content: Generate professional, tailored cover letters for specific job applications using AI. Your cover letters will be customized based on your resume and the job description.

steps.title: Select Resume
steps.content: Choose the resume you want to use as the basis for your cover letter. The cover letter will reference your experience and skills from this resume.

steps.title: Job Information
steps.content: Enter the job title, company name, job description, and hiring manager's name (optional) to personalize your cover letter.

steps.title: Tone Selection
steps.content: Choose the tone for your cover letter: Professional, Friendly, or Formal. Each tone creates a different style of communication.

steps.title: Generate Cover Letter
steps.content: Click this button to generate your personalized cover letter. The AI will create a tailored letter based on your resume and job details.

steps.title: Generated Cover Letter
steps.content: Your AI-generated cover letter appears here. You can copy, download, or regenerate it with different settings.

steps.title: Cover Letter History
steps.content: View all your previously generated cover letters here. You can access, copy, or regenerate any past cover letter.

steps.title: Resume Evaluator
steps.content: Get AI-powered feedback and suggestions to improve your resume. The evaluator analyzes your resume and provides actionable recommendations.

steps.title: Select Resume or Profile
steps.content: Choose which resume to evaluate, or select 'Current Profile' to evaluate your account data. This determines what will be analyzed.

steps.title: Evaluate Button
steps.content: Click this button to start the evaluation. The AI will analyze your resume and provide a comprehensive score with detailed feedback.

steps.title: Overall Score
steps.content: Your overall resume score out of 10 is displayed here. This gives you a quick overview of your resume's quality.

steps.title: Evaluation Status
steps.content: The status shows whether your resume is excellent, good, or needs improvement based on the AI analysis.

steps.title: Issues & Recommendations
steps.content: Detailed issues found in your resume are listed here with priority levels. Each issue includes specific recommendations for improvement.

steps.title: General Suggestions
steps.content: AI-generated suggestions to improve your resume overall. These are actionable tips to enhance your resume's effectiveness.
